response.overview: In pursuit of clues to find his father, Ging, Gon sets his sights on the legendary Hunter-exclusive video game, Greed Island. Together with Killua, he heads to Yorknew City to bid for it at the world's greatest auction.  After a costly conflict with the Phantom Troupe leaves them bankrupt on auction day, the duo shifts tactics. They join the game as hired players for Battera, the billionaire who purchased every copy.  Inside Greed Island, Gon and Killua clash with skilled participants like Genthru, Tsezguerra, and Goreinu. Their journey takes a decisive turn when they meet Biscuit Krueger, a formidable trainer who puts them through a grueling regimen. As their combat abilities soar, they must confront the game's formidable enemies and unravel its secrets.  The ultimate challenge awaits: Can Gon clear the game and finally meet Ging?
response.title: HUNTER X HUNTER THE STAGE 3
